Class TFTPPacket

  • java.lang.Object
    • TFTPPacket
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TFTPPacket.ACK, TFTPPacket.DATA, TFTPPacket.ERROR, TFTPPacket.RRQ, TFTPPacket.WRQ

    public abstract class TFTPPacket
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a TFTP packet which has been received or will be sent
    Author:
    Samuel Dewan

      Represents a TFTP read request
      static class  TFTPPacket.TFTPError
      Represents the error code from a TFTP error packet.
      static class  TFTPPacket.TFTPMode
      Represents the mode field of a TFTP read or write request.
      static class  TFTPPacket.WRQ
